Clive Khulubuse Zuma bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa, na nwa nwanne onye isi ala mbụ, Jacob Zuma
A kpọrọ aha Zuma na Panama Papers leak n'ihi njikọ ya na mmanụ na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe onye isi ala Zuma, nwanne nna ya, zutere onye isi ala DRC Joseph Kabila, ụlọ ọrụ Zuma bụ Caprikat Limited nwetara nkwekọrịta mmanụ R100 ijeri rand na DRC.
N'afọ 2014, ọ lụrụ adaeze Swazi, Fikisiwe Dlamini.
